COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120
STRING: [Torta] “Morning. Looks like you actually woke up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x152
STRING: [Chris] “I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168
STRING: Chris stood in the doorway, dressed in his school
uniform.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174
STRING: I cried myself to sleep the night before, but I took a
long bath in the morning, so there were no traces of
that remaining.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0
STRING: [Chris] “Is Ninna already awake?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c6
STRING: [Torta] “Of course she is... She's up early every day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8
STRING: [Chris] “Oh. I'll go say hi.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21c
STRING: Chris passed by me and greeted my grandmother in the
living room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x266
STRING: [Chris] “Good Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x298
STRING: [Ninna] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ca
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e8
STRING: [Ninna] “Because you came to say hi.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, right. Thank you for today. For the tickets to
the concert you were looking forward to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x342
STRING: [Ninna] “It's fine. You go listen to lots of good music.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x374
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, ma'am...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38a
STRING: Maybe Chris was still being polite, as he bowed with a
slightly gloomy expression.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0
STRING: Perhaps I should have been polite as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ac
STRING: But Chris didn't know the truth, and he thought that my
grandma gave up on going to the concert for him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c2
STRING: That being said, I couldn't tell him the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ce
STRING: [Torta] “Chris. We have to go to church soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f8
STRING: So I spoke to Chris in an especially cheery voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x404
STRING: That way, Chris wouldn't notice anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42c
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, yeah. Alright, we'll be back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x442
STRING: [Torta] “Grandma, it depends on the time, but is it okay
if we don't come back before the concert?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46a
STRING: [Ninna] “That's fine, of course. It may be difficult for you
to find somewhere to eat, but I don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48a
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f2
STRING: I walked slightly in front of Chris and hummed the
hymns that I could hear from far away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x508
STRING: When I was a first and second-year student, they had us
sing these hymns in class during this season.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51e
STRING: I had to meet Chris as Arie on Natale, so I didn't
participate in the volunteer choir.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55a
STRING: [Chris] “What? Singing all of a sudden.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x570
STRING: Chris caught up to me at some point and asked me this
with a curious look on his face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x586
STRING: He seemed surprised that I started singing suddenly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x592
STRING: [Torta] “Come on, can't you hear it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b0
STRING: [Chris] “You can sing it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c6
STRING: Chris didn't learn anything in class, and asked me this
honestly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d2
STRING: [Torta] “We learn them. I suppose Fortelle students
don't do that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60e
STRING: [Chris] “We do simple vocal songs.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x624
STRING: [Torta] “And there are lots of students from the
communal school singing at today's Mass.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x660
STRING: [Chris] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x676
STRING: [Torta] “You know that they sing hymns in church all
day today, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x696
STRING: [Torta] “It would be impossible for one choir, so they
split into about three groups so some can rest while the
others sing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c0
STRING: [Torta] “So a fair few people are needed, and our school
recruits a certain number every year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e8
STRING: [Chris] “There's no pay for that kind of thing, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fe
STRING: [Torta] “Of course not. I heard they get a free meal,
though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x730
STRING: [Chris] “You won't do it, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x746
STRING: [Torta] “Do I look like I would?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x778
STRING: [Chris] “This is just my opinion, but I asked because you
look like you would.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x798
STRING: [Torta] “Really...? Well, I'm pretty busy this time of year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ca
STRING: [Chris] “Well, that's your choice to make, I don't really
care.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e0
STRING: [Torta] “Exactly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x838
STRING: The cathedral shone like a giant sculpture in the sun, it
was beautiful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84e
STRING: If you were to name the two most famous places in the
city, it would be the cathedral and the concert hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x864
STRING: The line to receive the priest's blessing and pray at
Mass was long, and Chris and I queued up at the end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x896
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe another thirty minutes or so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ac
STRING: Chris said this in a quiet voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b8
STRING: The people around us weren't talking much, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c4
STRING: As the sound of the choir got louder, the people around
us became quieter, making us keep it down ourselves.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8da
STRING: Everyone had come there to pray, so that may have
been natural.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f0
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm, there are more people than I thought. It
may be an hour.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x918
STRING: [Chris] “There's usually half this many at this hour.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92e
STRING: [Torta] “Uh-huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x944
STRING: I answered at once and quickly put on a smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x950
STRING: When Arie and Chris had come here, I was supposed to
have been house-sitting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x966
STRING: If he asked for details, all I could do was answer that I
read it in a letter from Arie. I couldn't think of how to
explain anything further.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x986
STRING: I hid that under another smile and looked away,
pretending to face the front of the line.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9aa
STRING: Chris seemed to stop talking at that , and instead was
listening to the hymns.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e8
STRING: After a long time we entered the chapel, where the
hymns sounded even more powerful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fe
STRING: It stirred my blood as a voice student, and I just wanted
to start singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa14
STRING: I held that in, and followed the line inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2a
STRING: The line progressed slowly, so I closed my eyes and
imagined myself as a part of that song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa68
STRING: When I opened my eyes again, the line had moved
forward and it was almost my turn.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7e
STRING: Because both us were in a single line, Chris and I would
be blessed together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa94
STRING: As the person in front of us stood before the priest, we
bowed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaaa
STRING: [Torta] “Bless me, Father.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac0
STRING: We both said this at the same time, and took a step
forward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xacc
STRING: The priest's blessing was over quickly, and we then
moved to the side of the line.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb08
STRING: [Chris] “So after this...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1e
STRING: [Torta] “We'll stay a little longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb50
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb66
STRING: I guess you could call it our yearly tradition.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb72
STRING: We stayed behind in the church to pray.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb92
STRING: The main reason for praying was to reflect on one's life
up to that point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9e
STRING: I had told so many lies that I had no time to regret
them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb4
STRING: And I would have to keep lying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc0
STRING: However, it was only for one more month.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbcc
STRING: I didn't know what would happen after that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd8
STRING: Would the time for Chris and Arie to see each other
come, or would it not?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbee
STRING: And what about me then?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfa
STRING: Where would I be?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc06
STRING: Would I remain in this city?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc12
STRING: Or would I be with Chris?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1e
STRING: Was my desire to be with Chris too much to ask for
such a sinful person as myself?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc56
STRING: I opened my eyes at the sudden moment of silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc62
STRING: Chris was still praying next to me with his eyes closed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc78
STRING: Our eyes met when Chris opened his, and he spoke
shyly, mistakenly thinking I had been staring at him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcaa
STRING: [Chris] “What...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc0
STRING: I shook my head silently, and urged him outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xccc
STRING: [Torta] “We should get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1c
STRING: We were left with the fact that there would be nothing
to do if we went back home, but it was too long a wait
to not eat anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3c
STRING: We talked about eating out, but everyone had Natale
off, so nowhere was open.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd52
STRING: We walked for a while from the New District, but there
weren't any places we could eat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd68
STRING: We progressed into the Old District, having given up
and decided we had to search there. Then I saw that
the calzone stand that I recognized was open.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd88
STRING: Only the price was written on the wooden sign next to
the stand, and on the sign on top of the stand, “Marco's
Calzones” was written in big letters. It must have been
his name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb2
STRING: [Torta] “Ah. What about that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc8
STRING: Our chances of finding a place even in the Old District
were slim, so I felt this might be it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdde
STRING: I walked forward without waiting for a reply, and Chris
caught up to me, staring at the sign in annoyance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe10
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, but it may be the first time I've had them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe26
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, me too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe58
STRING: [Chris] “What, you too Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe82
STRING: When I think about it, I had spent my days off
practicing, and I don't think I had gone out with friends
in three years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe98
STRING: I didn't have as few friends as Chris, but I couldn't think
of a friend that I could easily talk to, like Asino was to
Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb8
STRING: I was always worried about Chris, and people realized
that, so I was only able to have friends to a certain
extent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed8
STRING: Of course, I saw that as a good thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee4
STRING: [Torta] “So this is good, then. I'm glad he came here on
a day like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0c
STRING: [Chris] “Everyone has the day off, so he probably does
better business than you'd think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf22
STRING: As we were talking, a number of people had already
lined up, just as Chris predicted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf38
STRING: It was lunch time, so there were probably a lot of
people with the same idea as us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf56
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, let's have this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6c
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfbc
STRING: The old man running the calzone stand was very
friendly, which caused Chris to wither a little bit, but he
did give us a half-price discount, and liked the
Communal Music School.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe6
STRING: Come to think of it, almost all the people of the city
were nice to students of the Communal Music School.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffc
STRING: Sitting with Chris on the rim of the fountain as we ate
the delicious calzones and gazed at the scenery, the
time went by in a flash.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101c
STRING: The glass canopy covering the piazza was shining
beautifully, bathed in the sunlight.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1050
STRING: [Chris] “That was really good...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1066
STRING: Chris spoke suddenly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1072
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, it was better than I thought.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a4
STRING: [Chris] “Still, it's hard to believe that that was your first
one, Torta. Didn't you like that kind of thing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c4
STRING: [Torta] “Hey... What kind of image do you have of me...
? Well, I may have a little before I came here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110a
STRING: [Chris] “That's exactly the image I have. Like on our way
home from the music school? You'd always be eating
something behind Arie and me after she came to get us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1134
STRING: [Torta] “You only remember that stuff. I shared it with
everyone after that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1170
STRING: [Chris] “It was always your idea to buy it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1186
STRING: [Torta] “Uh... Well, I won't deny that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a4
STRING: [Chris] “Not that you won't, you can't. But from the way
that old man talked, it looks like he's been working here
for a long time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ce
STRING: [Torta] “I've never seen him at night; maybe he closes in
the evening.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ec
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. So that doesn't mean you overlooked it,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1202
STRING: [Torta] “Well, I knew about it, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124a
STRING: [Torta] “I've been busy since I came here. I didn't have
the time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1286
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x129c
STRING: I kept remembering things about the past three years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b2
STRING: I realized a lot of things had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12be
STRING: I lot of it was hard, but I didn't regret it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e8
STRING: If Chris was right in front of me, and would just smile a
little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fe
STRING: That would be fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1312
STRING: [Chris] “You've worked really hard.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1332
STRING: Chris said that suddenly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133e
STRING: He wasn't supposed to know anything, but his words
made me feel like he cared about me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1354
STRING: It wasn't like I was being complimented.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1360
STRING: But I felt like that single phrase was my reward for
everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136c
STRING: [Torta] “Idiot...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1396
STRING: I desperately held back the tears that threatened to
flow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a2
STRING: I managed to hold them back, and it took just a little
time for me to return to normal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b8
STRING: But it seemed like Chris was worrying about something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13cc
STRING: [Chris] “No, umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e2
STRING: By the time he anxiously said this, my tears had already
dried and my voice was back to normal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f8
STRING: [Torta] “Well, it's about time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142a
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah. It's still a little early... But it's better than
being late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144a
STRING: [Torta] “Exactly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1472
STRING: On our way to the concert hall, I decided to throw away
the calzone wrapper I was holding in the garbage can
next to the stand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1492
STRING: [Marco] “Hey you two!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c4
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14da
STRING: When we came near the stand, the old man spoke to us
just as cheerfully as before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f0
STRING: [Marco] “How were my famous calzones?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1522
STRING: [Chris] “Uh, they were delicious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1538
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, really good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154e
STRING: With no need for pretense, Chris and I both answered
immediately.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1564
STRING: [Marco] “I see. That's good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157a
STRING: The old man said this very cheerily, and pulled out an
accordion from under the stand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ac
STRING: [Chris] “What's that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c2
STRING: [Marco] “It's an accordion. Don't you know that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f4
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... I knew that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160a
STRING: [Marco] “Ha-ha-ha, I'm kidding. There's still time before
the concert, so why don't we sing something? This is
the other thing my shop is famous for.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1648
STRING: It seemed he wanted to play for us, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x167a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, no. We don't have that much time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1690
STRING: [Marco] “Really? Surely there's still time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c2
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I suppose there is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d8
STRING: We did have a fair amount of time, but we definitely
couldn't be late today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ee
STRING: The tickets we had received from my grandma and Mrs.
Maier were precious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1704
STRING: If I left the talking to Chris, I didn't know how much time
it would take.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x171a
STRING: I felt bad for the friendly old man, but it would be best
for all of us to firmly decline this time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x173e
STRING: [Torta] “Chris. Umm, sorry. We're not in much of a hurry,
but... How about next time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1768
STRING: [Torta] “I like your calzones, so I'm sure we'll be back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1788
STRING: [Marco] “I'm glad you like them. Well, in that case, we'll
wait until next time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a8
STRING: [Torta] “I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17be
STRING: [Marco] “Don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d4
STRING: The old man really was a good person, and readily
accepted what we said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ea
STRING: All the same, we couldn't stay.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1800
STRING: Pretending to be in a hurry, we left the scene.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180c
STRING: I guess we had gotten several steps from there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1844
STRING: I heard Chris's quiet voice from behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1864
STRING: When I turned around, Chris had stopped and was
looking up at the canopy for some reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x187a
STRING: [Torta] “Chris? Is something wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ac
STRING: [Chris] “No... The rain...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ce
STRING: I had relaxed because we were under the canopy, but
Chris suddenly said that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e4
STRING: [Torta] “You're a dummy... It couldn't be that, you
know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18fa
STRING: Luckily, the canopy had been built sturdily. Even when it
actually rained, it would never leak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1910
STRING: I pointed to the canopy, and the old man's shoulders
shook with laughter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192a
STRING: [Marco] “Hmm? What about the rain?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195c
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, nothing. It must have been my imagination.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1972
STRING: [Marco] “Did you feel the rain?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a4
STRING: [Chris] “That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ba
STRING: I quietly watched this exchange with bated breath.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c6
STRING: If he started to say something strange, I'd have to stop
him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f8
STRING: [Chris] “The City of Rain... Huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0e
STRING: [Marco] “Hmm? The City of Rain?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a40
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... No, I was talking to myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a56
STRING: [Marco] “Ha-ha-ha. It is called that sometimes. Just what
are we talking about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a76
STRING: [Torta] “It's the City of Music now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a8c
STRING: [Marco] “Ha-ha-ha. That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa2
STRING: Maybe the pride of living in the city made him that way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aae
STRING: He laughed heartily as he played the accordion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aba
STRING: The old man looked up at the canopy, a sign that this
place was once called the “City of Rain,” and laughed
again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af6
STRING: [Chris] “Is that okay while you're working?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0c
STRING: [Marco] “I play every day. I said this shop was famous
for it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b40
STRING: It didn't look like there would be any more talk of rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b4c
STRING: I finally relaxed and could leave that place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b58
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, we really must be going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b76
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8c
STRING: [Marco] “Alright then, come again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bae
STRING: I was scared for a second, but I managed to evade the
worst.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bba
STRING: If he thought this way when I was around, I was really
worried about what happened when Chris was alone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bda
STRING: It was good that he didn't normally go out much, but
the fact that we made it three years without being
caught might have been nothing more than luck.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c3c
STRING: The long concert finished, and we went outside
together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c64
STRING: [Chris] “Phew... That was long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c7a
STRING: [Torta] “Really? I kind of felt like it was over in no time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c90
STRING: The fantastic music enriched my heart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c9c
STRING: That was the truth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca8
STRING: I shook my head, forcing myself out of a daze from all
the excitement.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cbe
STRING: [Torta] “But it really was good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cf0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah it was. But I wonder if this is the last time
we'll come here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d10
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm, I wonder. If we're successful, next time
we might be up on stage.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d38
STRING: [Chris] “Ah-ha-ha. That would be nice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4e
STRING: [Torta] “You're talking like it's someone else's problem.
Don't you want to be a professional?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d80
STRING: [Chris] “Honestly, I don't know... I think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d96
STRING: [Torta] “But I thought you were naturally aiming for that,
coming to this school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd2
STRING: [Chris] “Let's talk while we walk.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de8
STRING: Chris started walking to avoid answering right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0e
STRING: [Chris] “I thought that at first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e38
STRING: Then he started talking sporadically again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e44
STRING: [Torta] “Becoming a professional?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e62
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. But since I've been at school, my thinking
has changed a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e82
STRING: [Torta] “So what are you going to do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eb4
STRING: [Chris] “It's kind of embarrassing... But I haven't thought
of anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eca
STRING: [Torta] “That's ridiculous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1efc
STRING: [Chris] “I know. But I can't imagine it. Me becoming a
pro and performing on a stage like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f1c
STRING: [Torta] “So I'm asking what you're going to do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f4e
STRING: [Chris] “I don't know that either. I'm just concerned with
the graduation recital now... Can you just give me that?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6e
STRING: [Torta] “You'll finally think about it when that's over?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa0
STRING: [Chris] “That's my plan.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fb6
STRING: [Torta] “Well... Alright then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fcc
STRING: Was Chris already remembering?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fd8
STRING: But if that was the case, he'd realize that the letters
from Arie were strange.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fee
STRING: At the moment, I didn't think so.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ffa
STRING: Maybe he couldn't think about after graduation because
he really hadn't decided.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2010
STRING: I felt like he somehow didn't want to graduate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2024
STRING: [Chris] “Are you going to move right into being a
professional, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x203a
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm... It's a secret.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206c
STRING: [Chris] “What's that about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2082
STRING: [Torta] “I'll tell you when you decide and tell me about
it, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b6
STRING: That was the only way I could answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c2
STRING: You could say that my future would begin once Chris
properly faced the problem of Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20d8
STRING: Though as the one putting that off, my saying this was a
little silly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ee
STRING: Anyway, I wasn't the kind of person who could say that
about other people.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2104
STRING: Even so, I had to care for Chris, worry about him, and
help him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2122
STRING: [Chris] “That's mean...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2138
STRING: [Torta] “I don't mean to be. I was trying to get you to
think about it even a little, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2160
STRING: [Chris] “Am I that unreliable?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2176
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, you're that unreliable.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a8
STRING: [Chris] “Whoa.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21be
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha. Well, if you still haven't decided when
the time comes, I'll think with you. I'll help you however I
can.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2204
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Umm... Yeah, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x221a
STRING: [Torta] “However... However I can.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x223e
STRING: Really.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x224a
STRING: If that was what Chris wanted.
